description.zh-cn: 南宋开国皇帝，宋徽宗第九子。在位三十五年后禅让，是中国历史上在位时间最长的太上皇。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, the ninth son of Emperor Huizong of Song. After reigning for 35 years, he abdicated and became the longest-reigning Taishang Huang (retired emperor) in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第八位皇帝，宋高宗之父。他以其在艺术上的造诣而闻名，但在政治上被认为是昏庸的，他在位期间发生了靖康之难，他本人也被金人俘虏。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Northern Song dynasty and the father of Emperor Gaozong. He was known for his artistic talents but considered incompetent in governance. The Jingkang incident occurred during his reign, and he was captured by the Jurchen invaders.

description.zh-cn: 北宋末代皇帝，宋徽宗长子，宋高宗之兄。他与父亲宋徽宗一同在靖康之难中被金人俘虏。
description.en: The last emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, the eldest son of Emperor Huizong and the elder brother of Emperor Gaozong. He, along with his father, was captured by the Jurchen invaders during the Jingkang incident.

description.zh-cn: 南宋第二位皇帝，宋高宗的养子，宋太祖后裔。即位后为岳飞平反，并致力于恢复中原。
description.en: The second emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, the adopted son of Emperor Gaozong and a descendant of Emperor Taizu of Song. After ascending the throne, he posthumously rehabilitated Yue Fei and was dedicated to recovering the northern territories.

description.zh-cn: 宋高宗的生母，在靖康之难中被俘虏至金国，后根据绍兴和议的条款被送回南宋。
description.en: The birth mother of Emperor Gaozong. She was captured and taken to the Jin dynasty during the Jingkang incident and was later returned to the Southern Song as part of the Shaoxing Treaty.

description.zh-cn: 南宋抗金名将，主战派的代表人物。在绍兴和议达成前夕，被宋高宗以“莫须有”的罪名处死。
description.en: A renowned military general of the Southern Song dynasty who led forces against the Jin dynasty. A leading figure of the pro-war faction, he was executed by Emperor Gaozong on trumped-up charges just before the Shaoxing Treaty was concluded.

description.zh-cn: 南宋宰相，主和派代表人物，被广泛认为是策划和执行岳飞冤案的主谋。
description.en: A chancellor of the Southern Song dynasty and a leading figure of the pro-peace faction. He is widely considered the chief architect behind the wrongful execution of Yue Fei.

description.zh-cn: 南宋抗金名将，主战派大臣之一，后为达成和议被解除兵权。
description.en: A renowned military general of the Southern Song dynasty who resisted the Jin invasion. He was one of the leading pro-war ministers but was later stripped of his military command to facilitate peace negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 南宋初年宰相，坚决主张抗金，但因受到主和派的排挤而被罢免。
description.en: A chancellor in the early Southern Song dynasty who strongly advocated for resisting the Jin invasion but was dismissed due to opposition from the pro-peace faction.

description.zh-cn: 南宋初年宰相及将领，曾力主抗金，后与秦桧不和而被罢免。
description.en: A chancellor and military general in the early Southern Song dynasty. He advocated for resisting the Jin but was later dismissed due to conflicts with Qin Hui.

description.zh-cn: 北宋末、南宋初抗金名将，曾力劝康王赵构即位并收复失地。
description.en: A military general who resisted the Jin invasion during the late Northern Song and early Southern Song. He urged Prince Kang (the future Emperor Gaozong) to ascend the throne and recover lost territories.

description.zh-cn: 宋高宗唯一的亲生儿子，在苗刘兵变中被拥立为帝，但不久后因受惊吓而夭折。
description.en: Emperor Gaozong's only biological son. He was briefly enthroned during the Miao-Liu Mutiny but died shortly after from fright.

description.zh-cn: 宋高宗的妃嫔，皇子赵旉的生母。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Gaozong and the birth mother of Prince Zhao Fu.

description.zh-cn: 金朝名将、宗室，金朝对南宋战争的主要指挥官，在绍兴和议中坚持要求处死岳飞。
description.en: A prominent Jurchen general and imperial prince of the Jin dynasty. He was the chief commander in the wars against the Southern Song and insisted on Yue Fei's execution as a precondition for the Shaoxing Treaty.

description.zh-cn: 金朝第四位皇帝，他撕毁了绍兴和议，并发动了大规模的南侵，最终在采石之战中失败。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Jin dynasty. He tore up the Shaoxing Treaty and launched a large-scale invasion of the south, which ended in defeat at the Battle of Caishi.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝，曾作诗对宋高宗的评价极低，认为其偏安一隅，不配称为中兴之主。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty. He wrote poetry expressing extreme disdain for Emperor Gaozong, believing his policy of appeasement and ruling over a partial territory disqualified him from being considered a 'restoration' monarch.

description.zh-cn: 由宋高宗赵构在靖康之难后建立的政权，是宋朝的延续，与北方的金朝长期对峙。
description.en: A regime established by Zhao Gou (Emperor Gaozong) after the Jingkang incident, continuing the Song dynasty. It had a long-standing confrontation with the Jin dynasty to the north.

description.zh-cn: 由赵匡胤建立的宋朝的前半段，在中国历史上以经济和文化繁荣著称，最终亡于金朝的入侵。
description.en: The first half of the Song dynasty, founded by Zhao Kuangyin. It was known for its economic and cultural prosperity in Chinese history and eventually fell to the Jurchen Jin dynasty's invasion.

description.zh-cn: 由女真族建立的中国北方政权，灭亡了北宋，并与南宋长期对峙。
description.en: A dynasty in northern China founded by the Jurchen people, which conquered the Northern Song and engaged in a long-term standoff with the Southern Song.

description.zh-cn: 金朝军队攻破北宋首都汴京，俘虏了宋徽宗、宋钦宗两位皇帝以及大量皇族、官员，导致北宋灭亡的历史事件。
description.en: A historical event in which the Jurchen Jin army captured the Northern Song capital of Bianjing, taking Emperor Huizong, Emperor Qinzong, and numerous members of the imperial family and officials captive, leading to the fall of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 南宋初年由禁军将领苗傅和刘正彦发动的兵变，一度迫使宋高宗退位，并拥立其年幼的儿子赵旉为帝。
description.en: A mutiny in the early Southern Song initiated by imperial guard commanders Miao Fu and Liu Zhengyan, which briefly forced Emperor Gaozong to abdicate in favor of his infant son Zhao Fu.

description.zh-cn: 南宋与金朝签订的和平协议。南宋向金称臣、割地、赔款，换取了南北对峙的局面和宋高宗生母韦太后的归还。
description.en: A peace treaty signed between the Southern Song and Jin dynasties. The Southern Song agreed to become a vassal state, cede territory, and pay tribute in exchange for a stalemate and the return of Emperor Gaozong's mother, Empress Wei.

description.zh-cn: 南宋军队在采石（今安徽马鞍山）击败金帝完颜亮南侵大军的关键战役，阻止了金朝的征服企图。
description.en: A pivotal battle where the Southern Song army defeated the invading forces of Jin emperor Wanyan Liang at Caishi (modern Ma'anshan, Anhui), thwarting the Jin conquest attempt.

description.zh-cn: 宋高宗是宋徽宗的第九子。
description.en: Emperor Gaozong was the ninth son of Emperor Huizong.

description.zh-cn: 宋高宗的生母是显仁皇后韦氏。
description.en: Emperor Gaozong's birth mother was Empress Xianren, née Wei.

description.zh-cn: 宋高宗是宋钦宗的弟弟。
description.en: Emperor Gaozong was the younger brother of Emperor Qinzong.

description.zh-cn: 赵旉是宋高宗唯一的亲生儿子。
description.en: Zhao Fu was the only biological son of Emperor Gaozong.

description.zh-cn: 赵旉的生母是潘贤妃。
description.en: Zhao Fu's birth mother was Consort Pan.

description.zh-cn: 宋孝宗是宋高宗的养子和皇位继承人。
description.en: Emperor Xiaozong was the adopted son and heir of Emperor Gaozong.

description.zh-cn: 金朝军队南侵，最终攻破汴京，制造了靖康之难。
description.en: The Jin dynasty's army invaded south, eventually capturing Bianjing and causing the Jingkang incident.

description.zh-cn: 靖康之难导致北宋的灭亡。
description.en: The Jingkang incident led to the fall of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在靖康之难中，宋徽宗被金兵俘虏北上。
description.en: During the Jingkang incident, Emperor Huizong was captured by Jin forces and taken north.

description.zh-cn: 在靖康之难中，宋钦宗被金兵俘虏北上。
description.en: During the Jingkang incident, Emperor Qinzong was captured by Jin forces and taken north.

description.zh-cn: 靖康之难后，作为少数幸免于难的皇子，赵构得以在南方即位，建立南宋。
description.en: After the Jingkang incident, as one of the few surviving princes, Zhao Gou was able to ascend the throne in the south and establish the Southern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 宋高宗在南京应天府（今商丘）登基，建立了南宋政权。
description.en: Emperor Gaozong ascended the throne in Nanjing Yingtianfu (modern Shangqiu), establishing the Southern Song regime.

description.zh-cn: 在苗刘兵变中，宋高宗被迫禅让皇位给其子赵旉。
description.en: During the Miao-Liu Mutiny, Emperor Gaozong was forced to abdicate the throne to his son, Zhao Fu.

description.zh-cn: 赵旉在苗刘兵变中受到惊吓，不久后病逝。
description.en: Zhao Fu was frightened during the Miao-Liu Mutiny and died of illness shortly thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 为了与金朝达成“绍兴和议”，宋高宗下令处死了主战派将领岳飞。
description.en: To secure the 'Treaty of Shaoxing' with the Jin dynasty, Emperor Gaozong ordered the execution of the pro-war general Yue Fei.

description.zh-cn: 处死岳飞是金朝方面提出的达成绍兴和议的前提条件之一。
description.en: The execution of Yue Fei was one of the preconditions set by the Jin dynasty for concluding the Treaty of Shaoxing.

description.zh-cn: 金将兀术致信秦桧，提出“必杀飞，始可和”，将处死岳飞作为议和的条件。
description.en: The Jin general Wuzhu sent a letter to Qin Hui, stating that peace could only be achieved if Yue Fei was executed, making it a condition for the treaty.

description.zh-cn: 为了与金朝议和，宋高宗重用了主和派的秦桧。
description.en: In order to negotiate peace with the Jin dynasty, Emperor Gaozong heavily relied on the pro-peace faction leader Qin Hui.

description.zh-cn: 为推行与金朝议和的政策，宋高宗罢免了坚决主张抗金的宰相李纲。
description.en: To pursue a policy of peace negotiations with the Jin dynasty, Emperor Gaozong dismissed Chancellor Li Gang, a staunch advocate for resistance.

description.zh-cn: 在达成绍兴和议前夕，宋高宗解除了包括韩世忠在内的主战派大将的兵权。
description.en: On the eve of the Treaty of Shaoxing, Emperor Gaozong stripped pro-war generals, including Han Shizhong, of their military command.

description.zh-cn: 宋高宗主导并最终与金朝达成了绍兴和议，以称臣纳贡换取和平。
description.en: Emperor Gaozong initiated and concluded the Treaty of Shaoxing with the Jin dynasty, securing peace by accepting vassal status and paying tribute.

description.zh-cn: 根据绍兴和议的条款，金朝释放了宋高宗的生母韦太后，使其得以返回南宋。
description.en: According to the terms of the Treaty of Shaoxing, the Jin dynasty released Emperor Gaozong's mother, Empress Dowager Wei, allowing her to return to the Southern Song.

description.zh-cn: 金帝完颜亮撕毁了绍兴和议，并发动大规模南侵。
description.en: The Jin emperor Wanyan Liang tore up the Treaty of Shaoxing and launched a large-scale invasion of the south.

description.zh-cn: 完颜亮撕毁和议后发动的南侵，引发了采石之战。
description.en: The invasion launched by Wanyan Liang after breaking the treaty led to the Battle of Caishi.

description.zh-cn: 宋高宗以“倦勤”为由，禅让皇位给养子赵昚（宋孝宗）。
description.en: Citing 'weariness of duties', Emperor Gaozong abdicated the throne to his adopted son Zhao Shen (Emperor Xiaozong).

description.zh-cn: 宋孝宗即位后，立即为岳飞平反昭雪，恢复其名誉。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Xiaozong immediately posthumously rehabilitated Yue Fei, restoring his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 清高宗乾隆帝曾作诗对宋高宗进行批判，认为他偏安一隅、屈膝求和，不配称为“中兴之主”，对其评价极低。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor of the Qing dynasty wrote poetry criticizing Emperor Gaozong, deeming him unworthy of the title 'Restoration Monarch' due to his policy of appeasement and ruling over a partial territory, holding him in very low regard.
